summary: Ever kill your followers? Give em one of these and maybe you\'ll see em.
descriptionHtml:
[center] This is my first mod ever. [/center]
A multi purpose god weapon that is made from a Dawnbreaker, so it has a light on it. Stand alone. Craftable, temperable. Worth 100,000 gold for easy money from game\'s start. Good also for separating followers from the herd.
Location:
Craft at any forge under misc for one leather strip. Temper with the same (for comedic over kill only) at the grinding wheel.

[center] [b] My Mods [/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33925] Supergirl Costume [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33652] Facial expression Illustrated book [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32365] Evil book replacer for reading animations [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28806] Custom Races Utility [/url]
 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28531] Predator Shouts and Sounds [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28391] Comic Shop [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27678] Magic is light [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27316] Repulsor Beam [/url] [/center]
author: MurdermiesteR
